sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Nǐ yòng shénme fāngfǎ xuéxí?
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Quelle méthode utilises-tu pour apprendre ?
sentences_examples.sentence_en: What method do you use to study?

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huānyíng dào wǒ jiā zuòkè.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Bienvenue chez moi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Welcome to visit my home.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā zhèngzài chuàngzuò yī bù xiǎoshuō.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est en train d'écrire un roman.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is writing a novel.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ jìde tā de míngzi.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Je me souviens de son nom.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I remember his name.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Gōngsī xūyào chuàngxīn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: L'entreprise a besoin d'innovation.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The company needs innovation.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè zuò qiáo shì tiě zuò de.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce pont est en fer.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This bridge is made of iron.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lù shàng fāshēng le jiāotōng shìgù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Un accident de la circulation s'est produit sur la route.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: A traffic accident happened on the road.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Lǎoshī zhǐchū le wǒ de cuòwù.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Le professeur a pointé mes erreurs.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The teacher pointed out my mistakes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Shù shàng yǒu yī zhī niǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il y a un oiseau dans l'arbre.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: There is a bird in the tree.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Huìyìshì zài sān lóu.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: La salle de réunion est au troisième étage.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: The meeting room is on the third floor.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 这条裙子配那双鞋很好看。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè tiáo qúnzi pèi nà shuāng xié hěn hǎokàn.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Cette jupe va bien avec ces chaussures.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This skirt matches well with those shoes.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā fāchū le yī shēng tànxī.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a poussé un soupir.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He let out a sigh.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shì gōngsī de zhíyuán.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est employé de l'entreprise.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He is an employee of the company.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè shuāng xié hěn hé jiǎo.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ces chaussures vont bien au pied.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: These shoes fit well.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā yǐ dàodá Běijīng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il est déjà arrivé à Pékin.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He has already arrived in Beijing.

sentences_examples.sentence_zh: 他们为这件事争论起来。
sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tāmen wèi zhè jiàn shì zhēnglùn qǐlái.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ils se sont disputés à ce sujet.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: They started arguing about this matter.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒmen duì yǐ sān bǐ yī qǔshèng.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Notre équipe a gagné trois à un.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: Our team won three to one.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Zhè jǐnjǐn shì kāishǐ.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Ce n'est que le début.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: This is only the beginning.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Wǒ lù le yī duàn shìpín.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: J'ai enregistré une vidéo.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: I recorded a video.

sentences_examples.sentence_pinyin: Tā shīqù le gōngzuò.
sentences_examples.sentence_fr: Il a perdu son emploi.
sentences_examples.sentence_en: He lost his job.
